title: Would You Like Eyeglass Frames of Fossilized Coral?
description: The mother-and-son duo running E.B. Meyrowitz in London would be happy to oblige.
dc:creator: Rachel Garrahan
media:credit: Jeremie Souteyrat for The New York Times
media:description: A pair of glasses under construction at E.B. Meyrowitz in Hampton, England, outside London.
